docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 6. -- Mr. and Mrs. Alexander Graham Bell entertained at a reception this evening complimentary to Dr. Maria Montessori, when 400 members of Washington society met the noted Italian educator. The reception at the Bell residence in...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 6. -- Mr. and Mrs. Alexander Graham Bell entertained at a reception this evening complimentary to Dr. Maria Montessori, when 400 members of Washington society met the noted Italian educator. The reception at the Bell residence in Connecticut Avenue followed the illustrated lecture by Mme. Montessori at Masonic Temple.
docs.abstract: entertained in Washington by Mr. and Mrs. Alexander Graham Bell

headline.main: ENTERTAIN DR. MONTESSORI; Mr. and Mrs. Alexander Graham Bell's Reception Attended by 400.

docs.snippet: A clash in authority between the District Attorney's office of New York County and the District Attorney's office in Queens County seems imminent as the result of the discharge by Judge Burt J. Humphrey in the Queens County Court last Friday of a...
docs.lead_paragraph: A clash in authority between the District Attorney's office of New York County and the District Attorney's office in Queens County seems imminent as the result of the discharge by Judge Burt J. Humphrey in the Queens County Court last Friday of a woman convicted of violation of the tenement house law in this county.

headline.main: WHITMAN PRISONER SET FREE IN QUEENS; Mrs. Garcia, Arrested Here in Disorderly Resort Case, Released from Jail There. PROSECUTOR NOT NOTIFIED Contrary to Precedent ;- Queens Attorney Decided She Was Victim of Police Raider.
ARE FIXED PRICES MENACE TO PUBLIC?; Two Local Attorneys Say 'Yes,' but Fair Trade League Man Insists They Are Not.

docs.snippet: THE year 1913 closes, having fulfilled few of the prophecies made twelve months ago. Bulgaria, which then loomed large in the Balkans, has been humiliated, but not by the Turk. One of the results of the fighting there has been gigantic war budgets...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE year 1913 closes, having fulfilled few of the prophecies made twelve months ago. Bulgaria, which then loomed large in the Balkans, has been humiliated, but not by the Turk. One of the results of the fighting there has been gigantic war budgets for both Germany and France, with a sympathetic increase of the war budgets of the Netherlands and Belgium.
docs.abstract: REVIEW for 1913 of Events, Accidents, Achievements, &c.

headline.main: NOTEWORTHY EVENTS IN THE WORLD'S PROGRESS IN 1913; HEAVY MILITARY BUDGETS IN EUROPE Balkan Wars Also Result in Activity to Exploit Asia Minor Commercially. MEXICO OUR ONLY CLOUD Chronology of Activities, at Home and Abroad, by Governments, Institutions, and Individuals.
